flagsdescription.title: 519.lbm_r Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: This flag is supplied by the benchmark harness when building 619.lbm_s. It increases the size of the internal data structures.
This macro must be set by the compilation system when building the benchmark with OpenMP parallelization. It may not be set explicitly.
